page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This block includes two villages, Colney Heath and Welham Green, together with some open country. The area on the North of the block is Green Belt under threat from both urban and industrial development. Welham Green is already the country's largest industrial village and plans to extend it have gained momentum with British Rail's decision to open a new station at the village. Hatfield School, already sitting uneasily on the green belt is threatened both by the falling population of Hatfield New Town to the North, its main catchment area, and by the pressure on its land due to possible development.
